mapper.select: SELECT n.notification_id AS notificationId, n.content, n.service_id AS serviceId, n.is_read AS isRead, n.created_at AS createdAt, nt.notification_type_name AS typeName FROM notification n JOIN notification_type nt ON n.notification_type_id = nt.notification_type_id WHERE n.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY n.created_at DESC
